name: HENRY (goopions)
description:
*HENRY contains descriptions of murder and child abuse. I would encourage avoiding it if you find these topics sensitive.

You sit in front of a desk, in the middle of a room that seems to go on forever.

Made for Fortnightly Fiction Jam 2, but will hopefully be updated way more in the future. I have many many ideas to further the experience and I hope to implement them so please keep that in mind when you play!
